resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107892</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107892</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206924</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">American Memory Timeline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerikanischer Speicher Timeline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chronologie Américaine de Mémoire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Memória Americana Timeline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Memoria Americana Timeline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμερικανική υπόδειξη ως προς το χρόνο μνήμης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Memoria Americana Timeline</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps teachers and students navigate the vast online collections of primary source materials at the Library of Congress. The links, arranged by chronological period, lead to sets of selected primary sources on a variety of topics in U.S. history.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen Lehrer und Kursteilnehmer steuern die 
beträchtlichen Onlineansammlungen der Primärausgangsstoffe an der 
Bibliothek des Kongresses. Die Links, geordnet bis zum 
chronologischer Periode, führen zu Sets der ausgewählten 
Primärquellen auf einer Vielzahl von Themen in der VEREINIGTE STAATEN
Geschichte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les professeurs et les étudiants d'aides dirigent
les vastes collections en ligne de matériaux de source primaires à 
la bibliothèque du congrès. Les liens, disposés par la 
période chronologique, mènent aux ensembles de sources primaires 
choisies sur une variété de sujets dans l'histoire des ETATS-UNIS.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os professores e os estudantes das ajudas navigate
as coleções em linha vastas de materiais de fonte preliminares na 
biblioteca do congress. As ligações, arranjadas pelo período 
cronológico, conduzem aos jogos de fontes preliminares selecionadas 
em uma variedade dos tópicos no history de ESTADOS UNIDOS.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli insegnanti e gli allievi di aiuti traversano 
le collezioni in linea ampie di materie grezze primarie alla libreria 
del congresso. I collegamenti, organizzati entro il periodo 
cronologico, conducono agli insiemi delle sorgenti primarie 
selezionate su una varietà di soggetti nella storia degli STATI 
UNITI.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι δάσκαλοι και οι σπουδαστές οδηγιών πλοηγούν τις 
απέραντες σε απευθείας σύνδεση συλλογές των αρχικών υλικών 
πηγής στη βιβλιοθήκη του συνεδρίου. Οι συνδέσεις, που 
τακτοποιούνται μέχρι τη χρονολογική περίοδο, οδηγούν στα σύνολα 
επιλεγμένων αρχικών πηγών σε ποικίλα θέματα στην ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΗ 
ιστορία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los profesores y los estudiantes de las ayudas 
navegan las colecciones en línea extensas de materiales de fuente 
primarios en la biblioteca del congreso. Las conexiones, 
dispuestas por período cronológico, conducen a los conjuntos de 
fuentes primarias seleccionadas en una variedad de asuntos en la 
historia de ESTADOS UNIDOS.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206924</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107892</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/american-memory-timeline</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
